Format Sample Sizes for Publication

Source: R/utilities.R
format_n.Rd

Formats sample sizes with proper notation (N for total, n for subgroup).

Usage

format_n(n, type = c("N", "n"), include_label = TRUE)

Arguments

n

Integer or numeric vector of sample sizes

type

Character. "N" for total sample (default) or "n" for subgroup

include_label

Logical. Include "N = " or "n = " prefix? (default TRUE)

Value

Character vector of formatted sample sizes

Examples

# Total sample
format_n(150)  # "N = 150"
#> [1] "N = 150"

# Subgroup sample
format_n(45, type = "n")  # "n = 45"
#> [1] "n = 45"

# Multiple values
format_n(c(100, 50), type = "n")  # c("n = 100", "n = 50")
#> [1] "n = 100" "n = 50" 

# Without label
format_n(150, include_label = FALSE)  # "150"
#> [1] "150"
